properties.address: New Pasture Lane Community Centre, Bridlington, North Humberside YO16 7NR
properties.description: The Friday Lunch Club at New Pasture Lane Community Centre is a welcoming, warm space where everyone is invited to enjoy a delicious, homemade two-course lunch for just £3.50. The club operates during term time only, making it a great opportunity to connect with others in the community. Advance booking is essential to secure your place. Whether you’re looking for good food or friendly company, all are welcome at the Friday Lunch Club.
